news.title: OpenAI says AI browsers may always be vulnerable to prompt injection attacks
news.summary: OpenAI says prompt injections will always be a risk for AI browsers with agentic capabilities, like Atlas. But the firm is beefing up its cybersecurity with an "LLM-based automated attacker."

news.title: Call of Duty, Titanfall developer Vince Zampella has died at age 55
